data.message: Hi! Please read that and reaply. Somebody are reporting all my friends. Even me but thanks God I somehow log in. This isn't funny and your articles and links that you send to me not helpful. Because you have to do something not sent links. I was reported because of name or something like that. Then I read an article about how you can name yourself on facebook. But I didn't do something wrong. My first name is Gerda and Sim just a nickname but everyone nows that. Please do something.

replies.message: Hey Gerda. You can use the Privacy Checkup to review and adjust your privacy settings to make sure you're sharing stuff with the right people. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2qWQhwe. -Brittany
